arts.ttl: Torino in Monza to achieve back-to-back wins
arts.sum: The first match in Monza`s history in Serie A was played against Torino on 13 August 2022: a 2-1 victory for the Granata at the U-Power Stadium, with goals from Miranchuk and Sanabria for the Piedmontese and a goal from Dany Mota for the Lombards. Monza have not scored in their last two league games at the U-Power Stadium and the Brianza team could remain without a goal in three home games in a row for the first time in Serie A.

arts.ttl: Torino drop striker pursuit after Inter demand Ricci in exchange
